notes.title: Release Notes v1.1.0
items: Based on dash.js v1.2.0 (see dash.js release notes)
Simplified BufferController with sequential segments downloading
Optimized and simplified live edge searching
Sample application (samples/DemoPlayer) with dynamic bandwidth chart

notes.title: Release Notes v1.0.0
items: Based on dash.js v1.1.0 (see dash.js release notes)
PlayReady support with CustomData and license URL
